title: Privacy Policy | Limitless Taps
description: Learn how Limitless Taps collects, uses, and protects your data as a software development agency.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: We are committed to protecting the privacy of our clients and website visitors.

needHelp.title: Need Help?
needHelp.description: If you have questions about our privacy practices, please contact us.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us when you request a consultation, fill out a contact form, or engage our services. This may include your name, email address, phone number, company name, and project details.
collection.also: When you visit our website, we may automatically collect certain information, including:
collection.logInfo: Log Information: IP address, browser type, and pages visited.
collection.usageInfo: Analytics: Data on how you interact with our website to help us improve our user experience.

usage.title: How We Use Information
usage.intro: We use the information we collect to:
usage.provide: Provide our software development services and deliver project updates.
usage.process: Process payments and send invoices or contracts.
usage.send: Send you technical notices, updates about our services, and respond to your inquiries.
usage.respond: Communicate with you regarding your project or software solution requirements.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website or conducting our business (e.g., hosting providers, payment processors), provided they agree to keep this information confidential.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.intro: We use cookies to analyze website traffic and improve your browsing experience. These local files help us understand how potential clients interact with our site.
cookies.instruction: You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings, though this may affect some website functionality.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal and business information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We treat all client project details with strict confidentiality.
